Quincy.Woodward School for Girls: The Woodward School is a historical, private, secular day school for girls in grades six through twelve. It is located in Quincy, Massachusetts, near Quincy Center, and is the only private high school in the city. On top of its core syllabus, the school offers a wide curriculum which includes Latin, French, Spanish, Visual Arts including Painting, Drawing, Photography, Digital Design and Sculpture, Psychology, Rhetoric, Percussion, Music Theory, to name but a few.
